downtown_news_office.name: Downtown News Office
downtown_news_office.description: A bustling newsroom with rows of desks, computers, and the constant hum of activity. Large windows overlook the city skyline.
downtown_news_office.lighting: Bright fluorescent lighting with natural light from large windows

police_station___interrogation_room.name: Police Station - Interrogation Room
police_station___interrogation_room.description: A small, dimly lit room with a metal table and chairs. The walls are bare except for a one-way mirror.
police_station___interrogation_room.lighting: Dim overhead lighting, creates an atmosphere of tension

city_hall___mayor's_office.name: City Hall - Mayor's Office
city_hall___mayor's_office.description: An elegant office with mahogany furniture, leather chairs, and city memorabilia. Large windows provide a view of the city.
city_hall___mayor's_office.lighting: Warm, professional lighting with natural light from windows

sarah's_apartment.name: Sarah's Apartment
sarah's_apartment.description: A modest apartment cluttered with research materials, newspapers, and takeout containers. The living room serves as her home office.
sarah's_apartment.lighting: Warm lamp lighting, cozy but cluttered

abandoned_warehouse.name: Abandoned Warehouse
abandoned_warehouse.description: A large, empty warehouse with concrete floors and metal beams. Dust particles float in the air, and the space echoes.
abandoned_warehouse.lighting: Minimal lighting, shadows and darkness create tension
